actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to authorize the secretary of the Army to return to the Federal Republic of Germany ten paintings of the German Navy seized by the United States Army at the end of World War II.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army to return to the Federal Republic of Germany ten paintings of the German Navy by artist Claus Bergen which were seized from the German Government by the United States after World War II.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the secretary of the Army to return to the Federal Republic of Germany ten paintings of the German Navy seized by the United States Army at the end of World War II.
